mapper.sql: fid, fscore, flevel, version, ftradingqty, fleveltime, fuid
mapper.insert: insert into f_user_score ( fscore, flevel, version, ftradingqty, fleveltime, fuid ) values ( #{fscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftradingqty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fleveltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update f_user_score set fscore = #{fscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flevel = #{flevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fuid = #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = version + 1, ftradingqty = #{ftradingqty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fleveltime = #{fleveltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
